author: djames
msg: * autogen.py: Update autogen.py to reflect the fact that ctypesgen now
supports passing arbitrary flags to the c preprocessor, via the "--cpp"
option.
NOTE: In order to compile the ctypes python bindings with this change,
you'll need to update to revision 12 or later of ctypesgen.

author: djames
msg: * autogen.py: Use distutils.sysconfig to find out the path to the Python
executable, so that this script will work on systems where the Python
executable has a non-standard name. Also, print out the wrap.py command
before executing it, so as to make it easier for folks to debug problems
if wrap.py doesn't work as expected.
Found by: glasser

author: djames
msg: * autogen.py: When we grab the list of preprocessor flags from apr-1-config,
only include standard flags that wrap.py can understand in our list of
flags. This change helps prevent wrap.py from choking on specialized flags,
such as "-no-cpp-precomp".
Found by: glasser

author: pburba
msg: Add a test for merging into target with switched children.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/merge_tests.py
(merge_to_path_with_switched_children): New.
(test_list): Add merge_to_path_with_switched_children as XFail.

author: malcolm
msg: * STATUS: Change my vote on r24483 to +0, and note the changes to merge.
